biotools.summary:
Learning Cascade Attention for fine-grained image classification.

Code for paper "Learning Cascade Attention for Fine-grained Image Classification", which currently under review at Elsevier Journal of Neural Networks(NN).

Train/test split for CUB-200-2011 dataset.

Rotate training set for data augmentation.

bioschemas.name: LCA-CNN
